final_poem:
Raindrops tap on windows,
Whispering secrets of night.
Leaves unfurl in delighted showers,
Dancing with each gentle hit.

Streams weave through the garden,
Beneath an azure expanse.
Clouds gather, dark and vast,
As if to cradle the land.

In every splash and cascade,
Nature's melody plays.
Rain, a soothing lullaby,
Cleansing earth of dust and haze.
